== Main Inclusion Report for gdome2 ==

# Security: No security isses reported
# Quality assurance:
** Maintained quite well in Debian:  http://packages.qa.debian.org/g/gdome2.html
** Just two open Debian bug:
** ''normal'' bug, which has a patch pending upstream
** ''wishlist'' bug
 0. Standards compliance:
** The package meets the FHS, Debian Policy.
** Native package at the moment, Debian bug was filed.
 0. Dependencies:
** Build-Depends only on main stuff (`debhelper (>> 3.0.0), libxml2-dev (>= 2.4.26), libglib2.0-dev (>= 2.2.0)`)
